Disclaimer

Please do not use your audio while driving or operating machinery.

Hypnotherapy is a very safe form of therapy. However, please do not use if you have a history of psychosis or a drug or alcohol addiction. If you suffer from epilepsy, please consult your doctor prior to using hypnotherapy.

Remember, your safety is your responsibility.
